captions.text: Welcome to our latest video, today we're diving deep into the world of cars.
captions.prompt: A world map with cars driving on roads

captions.text: From vintage models to futuristic concepts, cars have shaped our world and continue to do so.
captions.prompt: Vintage car and futuristic car side by side

captions.text: Let's start with the history of cars, from the invention of the first steam-powered vehicle.
Fast forward to today, where we have cars that can drive themselves.
captions.prompt: A self-driving car on a city street

captions.text: And what does the future hold? Cars that fly? Cars that run on water?
captions.prompt: A flying car over a city

captions.text: Stay tuned as we explore the exciting evolution of cars. Thanks for watching.
captions.prompt: A montage of different types of cars
